text: Rippon is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Adam Rippon (born 1989), American figure skater *Angela Rippon (born 1944), British journalist *Geoffrey Rippon (1924–1997), British politician *John Rippon (1751–1836), English Baptist minister *Peter Rippon (born 1965), British broadcasting executive *Robert Henry Fernando Rippon (1836–1917), English zoologist and illustrator *Ruth Rippon (born 1927), American potter and sculptor *Ted Rippon (1914–1991), Australian footballer *Todd Rippon (born 1964), New Zealand actor *Tom Rippon (1954–2010), American sculptor
title: Rippon (surname)
